song.title: Close to God
song.info:
Winner of the multichannel music compo at The Party 1996.
[b]Croaker's comments:[/b] tp6 multichncompo yo bronx thanks to Pertti and his Korg 01/w
When i was young, i used to pray with my arms. i could feel close to god. When i was older, i used to pray with my feet. i could feel close to dog.
